title: Experimental Design for Deepening Mathematical Concept Learning Through Writing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematics concepts (quadratic equations, functions, statistics, etc.)
context.additional_context: Targets administrators/leaders, focusing on enhancing mathematical thinking applicable to workplace tasks

learning_goals: Learners improve concept comprehension by 30% by writing weekly math concept explanations (≥3 times/week) over four weeks
Learners enhance mathematical communication skills through argumentative writing (problem-solving documentation) and explanatory writing (equation/graph interpretation)
Through feedback-driven revision processes, learners develop self-assessment capabilities and improve written outputs ≥2 times
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
